short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Add a screenshot link to X posts

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Easily capture and share X posts! This extension adds a "Screenshot" button under the menu of every X post. Click it to instantly open xtoimage.com with a high-quality screenshot of the selected post. Perfect for archiving, sharing, or creating visuals from your favorite posts!
